title: Typeface family which decays?
content:
Hello..  
I’m looking for a typeface family which has the same style font in different stages of decay. Any suggestions?

 [‹ Question for the moderators: font malware](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42743 "Go to previous forum topic") [Web typography ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42739 "Go to next forum topic")
author: photosynthesize

comments.content:
Throwhand and Reactor are the only ones that do so intentionally in our library.

Cheers!

[FF Magda](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_magda/) + [FF Magda Clean](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_magda_clean/).

Then, this makes me think of those (MM ?) versions of typefaces whose usefulness I never fully grasped: [FF Meta Boiled](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_meta_boiled_boiled_exp/), [Myriad Tilt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907155544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/myriad_tilt/), …
and available in opentype now I believe...
